title: What champion is most like a bronzie?
body:
There's not a single champion which can truly represent a bronzie, it's a combination of these guys {{champion:29}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:62}} 

{{champion:29}} ugly, ratty, sneaky
{{champion:236}} Poor, thief, gang life
{{champion:62}} devolved human,  wild & crazy, only able to communicate through grunts
